title: House for sale in Colombo - 15
details:
two storied house (4500 Sq ft).
in Colombo - 15 (Centre Road)

The house consists of 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms & 4 car parking.

Within 2 mints walk to Center road
located on a private lane off Center road with a 20 feet wide road

garden area of about 6 Perch is available which can be used for car parking or small house

Land extent -15.5 perches
Price:- 55 M


Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
